words.translation: (The) revelation|(of) the Book|(is) from|Allah|the All-Mighty|the All-Wise

translations.1: Tanzeelul Kitaabi minal laahil 'Azeezil Hakeem

words.translation: Indeed We|[We] have revealed|to you|the Book|in truth|so worship|Allah|(being) sincere|to Him|(in) the religion

translations.1: Innaaa anzalnaaa ilaikal Kitaaba bilhaqqi fa'budil laaha mukhlisal lahud deen

words.translation: Unquestionably|for Allah|(is) the religion|the pure|And those who|take|besides Him|besides Him|protectors|Not|we worship them|except|that they may bring us near|to|Allah|(in) position|Indeed|Allah|will judge|between them|in|what|they|[in it]|differ|Indeed|Allah|(does) not|guide|(one) who|[he]|(is) a liar|and a disbeliever

translations.1: Alaa lillaahid deenul khaalis; wallazeenat takhazoo min dooniheee awliyaaa'a maa na'buduhum illaa liyuqar-riboonaaa ilal laahi zulfaa; innal laaha yahkumu baina-hum fee maa hum feehi yakhtalifoon; innal laaha laa yahdee man huwa kaazibun kaffaar

words.translation: If|Allah (had) intended|Allah (had) intended|to|take|a son|surely, He (could) have chosen|from what|He creates|whatever|He willed|Glory be to Him|He|(is) Allah|the One|the Irresistible

translations.1: Law araadal laahu aien yattakhiza waladal lastafaa mimmaa yakhluqu maa yashaaa'; Subhaanahoo Huwal laahul Waahidul Qahhaar

words.translation: He created|the heavens|and the earth|in [the] truth|He wraps|the night|over|the day|and wraps|the day|over|the night|And He subjected|the sun|and the moon|each|running|for a term|specified|Unquestionably|He|(is) the All-Mighty|the Oft-Forgiving

translations.1: Khalaqas samaawaati wal-arda bilhaqq; yukawwirul laila 'alan nahaari Wa-yukawwirun nahaara 'alaal laili Wa-sakhkharash shamsa walqamara kulluny yajree li-ajalim musammaa; alaa Huwal 'Azeezul Ghaffaar

words.translation: He created you|from|a soul|single|Then|He made|from it|its mate|And He sent down|for you|of|the cattle|eight|kinds|He creates you|in|(the) wombs|(of) your mothers|creation|after|after|creation|in|darkness[es]|three|That|(is) Allah|your Lord|for Him|(is) the dominion|(There is) no|god|except|He|Then how|are you turning away

translations.1: Khalaqakum min nafsinw waahidatin summa ja'ala minhaa zawjahaa Wa-anzala lakum minal an'aami samaani-yata azwaaj; yakhlu-qukum fee butooni ummahaatikum khalqam mim ba'di khalqin fee zulumaatin salaas; zaalikumul laahu Rabbukum lahul mulk; laaa ilaaha illaa Huwa fa-annaa tusrafoon

words.translation: If|you disbelieve|then indeed|Allah|(is) free from need|of you|And not|He likes|in His slaves|ungratefulness|And if|you are grateful|He likes it|in you|And not|will bear|bearer of burdens|(the) burden|(of) another|Then|to|your Lord|(is) your return|then He will inform you|about what|you used (to)|do|Indeed, He|(is) the All-Knower|of what (is) in the breasts|of what (is) in the breasts

translations.1: In takfuroo fa-innal laaha ghaniyyun 'ankum; Wa-laa yardaa li'ibaadihil kufra Wa-in tashkuroo yardahu lakum; Wa-laa taziru waaziratunw wizra ukhraa; summa ilaa Rabikum marji'ukum fa-yunabbi'ukum bimaa kuntum ta'maloon; innahoo 'aleemum bizaatis sudoor

words.translation: And when|touches|[the] man|adversity|he calls|(to) his Lord|turning|to Him|then|when|He bestows on him|a favor|from Himself|he forgets|(for) what|he used to call|he used to call|[to] Him|before|before|and he sets up|to Allah|rivals|to mislead|from|His Path|Say|Enjoy|in your disbelief|(for) a little|Indeed, you|(are) of|(the) companions|(of) the Fire

translations.1: Wa-izaa massal insaana durrun da'aa Rabbahoo muneeban ilaihi summa izaa khawwalahoo ni'matam minhu nasiya maa kaana yad'ooo ilaihi min qablu Wa-ja'ala lillaahi andaadal liyudilla 'an sabeelih; qul tamatta' bikufrika qaleelan innaka min Ashaabin Naar;

words.translation: Is (one) who|[he]|(is) devoutly obedient|(during) hours|(of) the night|prostrating|and standing|fearing|the Hereafter|and hoping|(for the) Mercy|(of) his Lord|Say|Are|equal|those who|know|and those who|(do) not|know|Only|will take heed|those of understanding|those of understanding

translations.1: Amman huwa qaanitun aanaaa'al laili saajidanw Wa-qaaa'imai yahzarul Aakhirata Wa-yarjoo rahmata Rabbih; qul hal yastawil lazeena ya'lamoona wallazeena laa ya'lamoon; innamaa yatazakkaru ulul albaab

words.translation: Say|O My slaves|[those] who|believe!|Fear|your Lord|For those who|do good|in|this|world|(is) good|and the earth|(of) Allah|(is) spacious|Only|will be paid back in full|the patient|their reward|without|account

translations.1: Qul yaa-'ibaadil lazeena aamanut taqoo Rabbakum; lillazeena ahsanoo fee haazihid dunyaa hasanah; Wa-ardul laahi waasi'ah; innamaa yuwaffas saabiroona ajrahum bighayri hisab

words.translation: Say|Indeed I|[I] am commanded|that|I worship|Allah|(being) sincere|to Him|(in) the religion

translations.1: Qul inneee umirtu an a'budal laaha mukhlisal lahud deen

words.translation: And I am commanded|that|I be|(the) first|(of) those who submit

translations.1: Wa-umirtu li-an akoona awwalal muslimeen

words.translation: Say|Indeed I|[I] fear|if|I disobey|my Lord|(the) punishment|(of) a Day|great

translations.1: Qul inneee akhaafu in 'asaitu Rabbee 'azaaba Yawmin 'azeem

words.translation: Say|I worship Allah|I worship Allah|(being) sincere|to Him|(in) my religion

translations.1: Qulil laaha a'budu mukhlisal lahoo deenee

words.translation: So worship|what|you will|besides Him|besides Him|Say|Indeed|the losers|(are) those who|(will) lose|themselves|and their families|(on the) Day|(of) the Resurrection|Unquestionably|that|it|(is) the loss|the clear

translations.1: Fa'budoo maa shi'tum min doonih; qul innal khaasireenal lazeena khasirooo anfusahum Wa-ahleehim yawmal qiyaamah; alaa zaalika huwal khusraanul mubeen

words.translation: For them|from|above them|coverings|of|the Fire|and from|below them|coverings|(With) that|threatens|Allah|[with it]|His slaves|O My slaves!|So fear Me

translations.1: Lahum min fawqihim zulalum minan Naari Wa-min tahtihim zulal; zaalika yukhaw-wiful laahu bihee 'ibaadah; yaa-'ibaadi fattaqoon

words.translation: And those who|avoid|the false gods|lest|they worship them|and turn|to|Allah|for them|(is) the glad tiding|So give glad tidings|(to) My slaves

translations.1: Wallazeenaj tanabut Taaghoota aien ya'budoohaa Wa-anaabooo ilal laahi lahumul bushraa; fabashshir 'ibaad

words.translation: Those who|they listen (to)|the Word|then follow|the best thereof|those|(are) they whom|Allah has guided them|Allah has guided them|and those|are [they]|the men of understanding|the men of understanding

translations.1: Allazeena yastami'oonal qawla fayattabi'oona ahsanah; ulaaa'ikal lazeena hadaahumul laahu Wa-ulaaa'ika hum ulul albaab

words.translation: Then is (one) who|became due|on him|the word|(of) the punishment|Then can you|save|(one) who|(is) in|the Fire

translations.1: Afaman haqqa 'alaihi kalimatul 'azaab; afa-anta tunqizu man fin Naar

words.translation: But|those who|fear|their Lord|for them|(are) lofty mansions|above them|above them|lofty mansions|built high|flow|from|beneath them|the rivers|(The) Promise|(of) Allah|Not|Allah fails|Allah fails|(in His) promise

translations.1: Laakinil lazeenat taqaw Rabbahum lahum ghurafum min fawqihaa ghurafum mabniyyatun tajree min tahtihal anhaar; wa'dal laah; laa yukhliful laahul mee'aad

words.translation: Do not|you see|that|Allah|sends down|from|the sky|water|and He makes it flow|(as) springs|in|the earth|then|He produces|with it|crops|(of) different|colors|then|they wither|and you see them|turn yellow|then|He makes them|debris|Indeed|in|that|surely, (is) a reminder|for those of understanding|for those of understanding

translations.1: Alam tara annal laaha anzala minas samaaa'i maaa'an fasalakahoo yanaabee'a fil ardi summa yukhriju bihee zar'am mukhtalifan alwaanuhoo summa yaheeju fatarahu musfarran summa yaj'aluhoo hutaamaa; inna fee zaalika lazikraa li-ulil albaab

words.translation: So is (one for) whom|Allah has expanded|Allah has expanded|his breast|for Islam|so he|(is) upon|a light|from|his Lord|So woe|to (those are) hardened|their hearts|from|(the) remembrance of Allah|(the) remembrance of Allah|Those|(are) in|error|clear

translations.1: Afaman sharahal laahu sadrahoo lil-Islaami fahuwa 'alaa noorim mir Rabbih; fa-wailul lilqaasiyati quloobuhum min zikril laah; ulaaa'ika fee dalaalim mubeen

words.translation: Allah|has revealed|(the) best|(of) [the] statement|a Book|(its parts) resembling each other|oft-repeated|Shiver|from it|(the) skins|(of) those who|fear|their Lord|then|relax|their skins|and their hearts|at|(the) remembrance|(of) Allah|That|(is the) guidance|(of) Allah|He guides|with it|whom|He wills|And whoever|Allah lets go astray|Allah lets go astray|then not|for him|any|guide

translations.1: Allahu nazzala ahsanal hadeesi Kitaabam mutashaa-biham masaaniya taqsha'irru minhu juloodul lazeena yakhshawna Rabbahum summa taleenu julooduhum Wa-quloo-buhum ilaa zikril laah; zaalika hudal laahi yahdee bihee maien yashaaa'; Wa-maien yudlilil laahu famaa lahoo min haad

words.translation: Then (is) he who|will shield|with his face|(the) worst|punishment|(on the) Day|(of) the Resurrection|And it will be said|to the wrongdoers|Taste|what|you used (to)|earn

translations.1: Afamaien yattaqee biwaj-hihee sooo'al 'azaabi Yawmal Qiyaamah; Wa-qeela lizzaali-meena zooqoo maa kuntum taksiboon

words.translation: Denied|those who|(were) before them|(were) before them|so came upon them|the punishment|from|where|not|they perceive

translations.1: Kazzabal lazeena min qablihim fa-ataahumul 'azaabu min haisu laa yash'uroon

words.translation: So Allah made them taste|So Allah made them taste|the disgrace|in|the life|(of) the world|and certainly (the) punishment|(of) the Hereafter|(is) greater|if|they|knew

translations.1: Fa-azaaqahumul laahul khizya fil hayaatid dunyaa Wa-la'azaabul Aakhirati akbar; law kaanoo ya'lamoon

words.translation: And indeed|We have set forth|for people|in|this|Quran|of|every|example|so that they may|take heed

translations.1: Wa-laqad darabnaa linnaasi fee haazal Qur-aani min kulli masalil la'allahum yatazakkaroon

words.translation: A Quran|(in) Arabic|without|any|crookedness|that they may|become righteous

translations.1: Qur-aanan 'Arabiyyan ghaira zee 'iwajil la'allahum yattaqoon

words.translation: Allah sets forth|Allah sets forth|an example|a man|belonging to|partners|quarreling|and a man|(belonging) exclusively|to one man|are|they both equal|(in) comparison|All praise|(be) to Allah|Nay|most of them|(do) not|know

translations.1: Darabal laahu masalar rajulan feehi shurakaaa'u mutashaakisoona Wa-rajulan salamal lirajulin hal yastawi-yaani masalaa; alhamdu lillaah; bal aksaruhum laa ya'lamoon

words.translation: Indeed you|will die|and indeed they|will (also) die

translations.1: Innaka maiyitunw Wa-inna-hum maiyitoon

words.translation: Then|indeed you|(on the) Day|(of) the Resurrection|before|your Lord|will dispute

translations.1: Summa innakum Yawmal Qiyaamati 'inda Rabbikum takhtasimoon

words.translation: Then who|(is) more unjust|than (one) who|lies|against|Allah|and denies|the truth|when|it comes to him|Is (there) not|in|Hell|an abode|for the disbelievers

translations.1: Faman azlamu mimman kazaba 'alal laahi Wa-kazzaba bissidqi iz jaaa'ah; alaisa fee Jahannama maswal lilkaafireen

words.translation: And the one who|brought|the truth|and believed|in it|those|[they]|(are) the righteous

translations.1: Wallazee jaaa'a bissidqi Wa-saddaqa biheee ulaaa'ika humul muttaqoon

words.translation: For them|(is) what|they wish|with|their Lord|That|(is the) reward|(of) the good-doers

translations.1: Lahum maa yashaaa'oona 'inda Rabbihim; zaalika jazaaa'ul muhsineen

words.translation: That Allah will remove|That Allah will remove|from them|(the) worst|(of) what|they did|and reward them|their due|for (the) best|(of) what|they used (to)|do

translations.1: Liyukaffiral laahu 'anhum aswa allazee 'amiloo Wa-yajziyahum ajrahum bi-ahsanil lazee kaano ya'maloon

words.translation: Is not|Allah|sufficient|(for) His slave|And they threaten you|with those|besides Him|besides Him|And whoever|Allah lets go astray|Allah lets go astray|then not|for him|any|guide

translations.1: Alaisal laahu bikaafin 'abdahoo Wa-yukhawwi-foonaka billazeena min doonih; Wa-maien yudlilil laahu famaa lahoo min haad

words.translation: And whoever|Allah guides|Allah guides|then not|for him|any|misleader|Is not|Allah|All-Mighty|All-Able of retribution|All-Able of retribution

translations.1: Wa-maien yahdil laahu famaa lahoo min mudil; alai-sal laahu bi'azeezin zin tiqaam

words.translation: And if|you ask them|who|created|the heavens|and the earth|Surely, they will say|Allah|Say|Then do you see|what|you invoke|besides|besides|Allah|if|Allah intended for me|Allah intended for me|harm|are|they|removers|(of) harm (from) Him|or|if He intended for me|mercy|are|they|withholders|(of) His mercy|Say|Sufficient (is) Allah for me|Sufficient (is) Allah for me|upon Him|put trust|those who trust

translations.1: Wa-la'in sa-altahum man khalaqas samaawaati wal-arda la-yaqoolunal laah; qul afara'aitum maa tad'oona min doonil laahi in araadaniyal laahu bidurrin hal hunna kaashi-faatu durriheee aw araadanee birahmatin hal hunna mumsikaatu rahmatih; qul hasbiyal laahu 'alaihi yatawakkalul mutawakkiloon

words.translation: Say|O my people!|Work|(according) to|your position|indeed I am|working|then soon|you will know

translations.1: Qul yaa qawmi'maloo 'alaa makaanatikum innee 'aamilun fasawfa ta'lamoon

words.translation: (Upon) whom|will come|a punishment|disgracing him|and descends|on him|a punishment|everlasting

translations.1: Maien yaateehi 'azaabunien yukhzeehi Wa-yahillu 'alaihi 'azaabum muqeem

words.translation: Indeed We|We revealed|to you|the Book|for [the] mankind|in truth|So whoever|accepts guidance|then (it is) for his soul|and whoever|goes astray|then only|he strays|against his (soul)|And not|you|(are) over them|a manager

translations.1: Innaa anzalnaa 'alaikal Kitaaba linnaasi bilhaqq; famanih tadaa falinafsihee Wa-man dalla fa-innamaa yadillu 'alaihaa Wa-maaa anta 'alaihim biwakeel

words.translation: Allah|takes|the souls|(at the) time|(of) their death|and the one who|(does) not|die|in|their sleep|Then He keeps|the one whom|He has decreed|for them|the death|and sends|the others|for|a term|specified|Indeed|in|that|surely (are) signs|for a people|who ponder

translations.1: Allaahu yatawaffal anfusa heena mawtihaa wallatee lam tamut fee manaamihaa fa-yumsikul latee qadaa 'alaihal mawta Wa-yursilul ukhraaa ilaaa ajalim musammaa; inna fee zaalika la-Aayaatil liqawmaien yatafakkarroon

words.translation: Or|have they taken|besides|besides|Allah|intercessors|Say|Even though|they were|not|possessing|anything|and not|they understand

translations.1: Amit takhazoo min doonil laahi shufa'aaa'; qul awalaw kaanoo laa yamlikoona shai'aw Wa-laa ya'qiloon

words.translation: Say|To Allah (belongs)|the intercession|all|For Him|(is the) dominion|(of) the heavens|and the earth|Then|to Him|you will be returned

translations.1: Qul lillaahish shafaa'atu jamee'aa; lahoo mulkus samaawaati wal-ardi summa ilaihi turja'oon

words.translation: And when|Allah is mentioned|Allah is mentioned|Alone|shrink with aversion|(the) hearts|(of) those who|(do) not|believe|in the Hereafter|and when|are mentioned|those|besides Him|besides Him|behold|They|rejoice

translations.1: Wa-izaa zukiral laahu wahdahush ma-azzat quloobul lazeena laa yu'minoona bil-Aakhirati Wa-izaa zukiral lazeena min dooniheee izaa hum yastabshiroon

words.translation: Say|O Allah!|Creator|(of) the heavens|and the earth|Knower|(of) the unseen|and the witnessed|You|will judge|between|Your slaves|in|what|they used (to)|therein|differ

translations.1: Qulil laahumma faatiras samaawaati wal-ardi 'Aalimal Ghaibi washshahaadati Anta tahkumu baina 'ibaadika fee maa kaanoo feehee yakhtalifoon

words.translation: And if|And if|those who|did wrong|(had) whatever|(is) in|the earth|all|and (the) like of it|with it|they would ransom|with it|from|(the) evil|(of) the punishment|(on the) Day|(of) the Resurrection|And (will) appear|to them|from|Allah|what|not|they had|taken into account

translations.1: Wa-law anna lillazeena zalamoo maa fil ardi jamee'anw Wa-mislahoo ma'ahoo laftadaw bihee min sooo'il azaabi Yawmal Qiyaamah; Wa-badaa lahum minal laahi maa lam yakkoonoo yahtasiboon

words.translation: And will become apparent|to them|(the) evils|(of) what|they earned|and will surround|them|what|they used (to)|[in it]|mock

translations.1: Wa-badaa lahum saiyiaatu maa kasaboo Wa-haaqa bihim maa kaanoo bihee yastahzi'oon

words.translation: So when|touches|[the] man|adversity|he calls upon Us|then|when|We bestow (on) him|a favor|from Us|he says|Only|I have been given it|for|knowledge|Nay|it|(is) a trial|but|most of them|(do) not|know

translations.1: Fa-izaa massal insaana durrun da'aanaa summa izaa khawwalnaahu ni'matam minna qaala innamaaa ootee-tuhoo 'alaa 'ilm; bal hiya fitna-tunw Wa-laakinna aksarahum laa ya'lamoon

words.translation: Indeed|said it|those|before them|before them|but (did) not|avail|them|what|they used (to)|earn

translations.1: Qad qaalahal lazeena min qablihim famaaa aghnaa 'anhum maa kaanoo yaksiboon

words.translation: Then struck them|(the) evils|(of) what|they earned|And those who|have wronged|of|these|will strike them|(the) evils|(of) what|they earned|and not|they|will be able to escape

translations.1: Fa-asaabahum saiyyi-aatu maa kasaboo; wallazeena zalamoo min haaa'ulaaa'i sa-yuseebuhum saiyyi-aatu maa kasaboo Wa-maa hum bimu'jizeen

words.translation: Do not|they know|that|Allah|extends|the provision|for whom|He wills|and restricts|Indeed|in|that|surely (are) signs|for a people|who believe

translations.1: Awalam ya'lamooo annal laaha yabsutur rizqa limai yashaaa'u Wa-yaqdir; inna fee zaalika la-Aayaatil liqawmien yu'minoon

words.translation: Say|O My slaves!|Those who|have transgressed|against|themselves|(do) not|despair|of|(the) Mercy|(of) Allah|Indeed|Allah|forgives|the sins|all|Indeed He|He|(is) the Oft-Forgiving|the Most Merciful

translations.1: Qul yaa'ibaadiyal lazeena asrafoo 'alaaa anfusihim laa taqnatoo mir rahmatil laah; innal laaha yaghfiruz zunooba jamee'aa; innahoo Huwal Ghafoorur Raheem

words.translation: And turn|to|your Lord|and submit|to Him|before|before|[that]|comes to you|the punishment|then|not|you will be helped

translations.1: Wa-aneebooo ilaa Rabbikum Wa-aslimoo lahoo min qabli ai yaatiyakumul 'azaabu summa laa tunsaroon

words.translation: And follow|(the) best|(of) what|is revealed|to you|from|your Lord|before|before|[that]|comes to you|the punishment|suddenly|while you|(do) not|perceive

translations.1: Wattabi'ooo ahsana maaa unzila ilaikum mir Rabbikum min qabli aien yaatiyakumal 'azaabu baghtatanw Wa-antum laa tash'uroon

words.translation: Lest|should say|a soul|Oh! My regret|over|what|I neglected|in|regard to|Allah|and that|I was|surely among|the mockers

translations.1: An taqoola nafsuien yaahasrataa 'alaa maa farrattu fee jambil laahi Wa-in kuntu laminas saakhireen

words.translation: Or|it should say|If only|If only|Allah|(had) guided me|surely, I (would) have been|among|the righteous

translations.1: Aw taqoola law annal laaha hadaanee lakuntu minal muttaqeen

words.translation: Or|it should say|when|it sees|the punishment|If|only|I had|another chance|then I could be|among|the good-doers

translations.1: Aw taqoola heena taral 'azaaba law anna lee karratan fa-akoona minal muhsineen

words.translation: Nay|verily|came to you|My Verses|but you denied|them|and were arrogant|and you were|among|the disbelievers

translations.1: Balaa qad jaaa'atka aayaatee fa-kazzabta bihaa Wa-stakbarta Wa-kunta minal kaafireen

words.translation: And (on the) Day|(of) the Resurrection|you will see|those who|lied|about|Allah|their faces|(will be) blackened|Is (there) not|in|Hell|an abode|for the arrogant

translations.1: Wa-Yawmal Qiyaamati taral lazeena kazaboo 'alal laahi wujoohuhum muswaddah; alaisa fee Jahannama maswal lilmutakabbireen

words.translation: And Allah will deliver|And Allah will deliver|those who|feared (Him)|to their place of salvation|not|will touch them|the evil|and not|they|will grieve

translations.1: Wa-yunajjil laahul lazee-nat taqaw bimafaazatihim laa yamassuhumus sooo'u Wa-laa hum yahzanoon

words.translation: Allah|(is the) Creator|(of) all|things|and He|(is) over|all|things|a Guardian

translations.1: Allaahu khaaliqu kulli shai'inw Wa-Huwa 'alaa kulli shai'inw Wakeel

words.translation: For Him|(are the) keys|(of) the heavens|and the earth|And those who|disbelieve|in (the) Verses|(of) Allah|those|they|(are) the losers

translations.1: Lahoo maqaaleedus sa-maawaati wal-ard; wallazeena kafaroo bi-ayaatil laahi ulaaa'ika humul khaasiroon

words.translation: Say|Is (it) other than|Allah|you order me|(to) worship|O|ignorant ones

translations.1: Qul afaghairal laahi taamurooonneee a'budu ayyuhal jaahiloon

words.translation: And verily|it has been revealed|to you|and to|those who|(were) before you|(were) before you|if|you associate (with Allah)|surely, will become worthless|your deeds|and you will surely be|among|the losers

translations.1: Wa-laqad oohiya ilaika Wa-ilal lazeena min qablika la-in ashrakta la-yahbatanna 'amalu-ka Wa-latakoonanna minal khaasireen

words.translation: Nay|But worship Allah|But worship Allah|and be|among|the thankful ones

translations.1: Balil laahha fa'bud Wa-kum minash shaakireen

words.translation: And not|they appraised|Allah|(with) true|appraisal|while the earth|entirely|(will be) in His Grip|(on the) Day|(of) the Resurrection|and the heavens|(will be) folded|in His Right Hand|Glory be to Him!|And High is He|above what|they associate (with Him)

translations.1: Wa-maa qadarul laaha haqqa qadrihee wal-ardu jamee-'an qabdatuhoo Yawmal Qiyaamati wassamaawaatu matwiyyaatum biyameenih; Subhaanahoo Wa-Ta'aalaa 'amma yushrikoon

words.translation: And (will) be blown|[in]|the trumpet|then (will) fall dead|whoever|(is) in|the heavens|and whoever|(is) on|the earth|except|whom|Allah wills|Allah wills|Then|(it will) be blown|[in it]|a second time|and behold|They|(will be) standing|waiting

translations.1: Wa-nufikha fis Soori fasa'iqa man fis samaawaati Wa-man fil ardi illaa man shaa'al lahu summa nufikha feehi ukhraa fa-izaa hum qiyaamuny yanzuroon

words.translation: And (will) shine|the earth|with (the) light|(of) its Lord|and (will) be placed|the Record|and (will) be brought|the Prophets|and the witnesses|and it (will) be judged|between them|in truth|and they|will not be wronged|will not be wronged

translations.1: Wa-ashraqatil ardu binoori Rabbihaa Wa-wudi'al Kitaabu Wa-jeee'a bin-nabiyyeena wash-shuhadaaa'i Wa-qudiya bainahum bilhaqqi Wa-hum laa yuzlamoon

words.translation: And (will) be paid in full|every|soul|what|it did|and He|(is the) Best-Knower|of what|they do

translations.1: Wa-wuffiyat kullu nafsim maa 'amilat Wa-Huwa a'lamu bimaa yaf'aloon

words.translation: And (will) be driven|those who|disbelieve|to|Hell|(in) groups|until|when|they reach it|(will) be opened|its gates|and (will) say|to them|its keepers|Did not|come to you|Messengers|from you|reciting|to you|(the) Verses|(of) your Lord|and warning you|(of the) meeting|(of) your Day|this|They (will) say|Nay!|But|has been justified|(the) word|(of) punishment|against|the disbelievers

translations.1: Wa-seeqal lazeena kafaroo ilaa jahannama zumaraa hattaaa izaa jaaa'oohaa futihat abwaabuhaa Wa-qaala lahum khazanatuhaaa alam ya'tikum Rusulun minkum yatloona 'alaikum Aayaati Rabbikum Wa-yunziroonakum liqaaa'a Yawmikum haazaa; qaaloo balaa Wa-laakin haqqat kalimatul 'azaabi 'alal kaafireen

words.translation: It will be said|Enter|(the) gates|(of) Hell|(to) abide eternally|therein|and wretched is|(the) abode|(of) the arrogant

translations.1: Qeelad khuloo abwaaba jahannama khaalideena feeha fabi'sa maswal mutakabbireen

words.translation: And (will) be driven|those who|feared|their Lord|to|Paradise|(in) groups|until|when|they reach it|and (will) be opened|its gates|and (will) say|to them|its keepers|Peace be|upon you|you have done well|so enter it|(to) abide eternally

translations.1: Wa-seeqal lazeenat taqaw Rabbahum ilal Jannati zumaraa hattaaa izaa jaaa'oohaa Wa-futihat abwaabuhaa Wa-qaala lahum khazanatuhaa salaamun 'alaikum tibtum fadkhuloohaa khaalideen

words.translation: And they will say|All praise|(be) to Allah|Who|has fulfilled for us|His promise|and has made us inherit|the earth|we may settle|in|Paradise|wherever|we will|So excellent is|(the) reward|(of) the workers

translations.1: Wa-qaalull hamdulillaahil lazee sadaqanaa wa'dahoo Wa-awrasanal arda natabaw wa-u minal jannati haisu nashaaa'u fani'ma ajrul 'aamileen

words.translation: And you will see|the Angels|surrounding|[from]|around|the Throne|glorifying|(the) praise|(of) their Lord|And (will) be judged|between them|in truth|and it will be said|All praise be|to Allah|(the) Lord|(of) the worlds

translations.1: Wa-taral malaaa'ikata haaaffeena min hawlil 'Arshi yusabbihoona bihamdi Rabbihim Wa-qudiya bainahum bilhaqqi Wa-qeelal hamdu lillaahi Rabbil 'aalameen
